name: Forretress
flavorText:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

previous.name: Pineco
previous.flavorText:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

next.name: Dunsparce
next.flavorText:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.
